topic.title: Libertarian Discussions
topic.body: This is a discussion topic for Liberty-minded individuals.

topic.title: Let's talk NEO and NEP-5 Tokens
topic.body:
I am a big NEO fan and think that the team behind it really have their act together. We can chat about NEO and NEO related items here

[NEO Website](https://neo.org/)

[NEO NEON Wallet](https://neonwallet.com/)

topic.title: Central Bank of England - Central Bank Digital Money for Households?
topic.body:
Will the future of banking in England be... a bank coin?

https://youtu.be/uRIBfiWfY74

topic.title: Registered Namecoin domain not showing on ZeroName after 2 days
topic.body:
I am trying to register a domain name using NAmecoin .bit domains. The domain name is showing as registered here - (https://namecha.in/name/d/artifaxradio)

But it is not showing in ZeroName after 2 days. Can it take longer than that?

1511539827_1FKuNsExQML7APuNmkCV8uzB5pKup.body:
> [barefootwarrior](#comment_24_15U3YgbPEj9eCVVCYKgvpu1WK9AUMaKWuc): Libertarian Blog: 15 peers but 'index not found'.

Still working on things :) Getting things set up

> [helium](#comment_84_1Pv5CdXMDJm5k5iAp4SVbutnMg2ue8e58p): Please, DO NOT ADVERTISE THINGS THAT ARE NOT COMPLETE!!!!!!!!! [...]

Listen... I'm completely new to this so excuse me LOL. The page works fine for me, but maybe that's because the files are on my computer. If, in your rant, you could have provided some constructive criticism or guidance of what I may have done wrong then that might have been more well received....

> [helium](#comment_87_1Pv5CdXMDJm5k5iAp4SVbutnMg2ue8e58p): Thank You for the answer.I was not able to conclude from Your previous posts that the page worked fine in Your setting.You may try to test the availability of Your page by using temporary identity through a ZeroNet proxy. [...]

Thanks for the reply. I will test. Yeah I am ground level newb when it comes to ZeroNet. I found the publish content thing in the sidebar and tried doing that so hopefully that helped fix it

I will look at the links you sent over. Much appreciated! :)

> [akito](#comment_385_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): A very good summary of today's "Libertarian's" situation.

Apparently you guys don't know very many true Libertarians. LOL. Most I know want less government control and a fair playing field for all businesses. They want big corporations control and monopolies in the field of business gone. Hence letting the free market decide things. We as consumers have to be diligent enough to help in this by using our dollars as voting mechanisms. We vote the bad actors out buy not buying their products. This takes effort and I'm afraid it's more effort than the average person is willing to expend IMHO.

1511947170_1G2KAr146veEMjvkrhD3sXMUH1fAu.body:
> [kurumi](#comment_2_13mGdnafb5589Tw76ADDnZ2fS9iLXSJerH): yeah that link doesnt work

It's an Onion link right? For Tor

1512118056_1PRBkqdksMYuzirNkxseoXGHYpxHg.body: Calm your jets little soldier. Ups and downs happen all the time in Bitcoin. I've been at this for so many years that I've seen it go up and seen it go down. The drops don't even phase me anymore

1512565682_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGN.body: Would be cool to see the tutorials :) Thanks

1512623414_1HBy99H2dsCwevdYZp8VVC2SVG69D.body: It'll get more attention. I'm actually making a presentation on it for a group currently to show them how to use it. If ZeroNet doesn't happen to get adoption though there are other projects currently working on decentralized internet solutions

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: How do you make a post sticky? Thanks in advance :)

> [stigmergikat](#comment_3_1KF6VwFZn83rJDhgQMNigUao9EtLfzThG4): What does it mean to click on "This is my site" on the "drag the top-right zero" sidebar? That shows up on all sites. What does it do?

It lets you mark which site is yours so you have edit control over it.

Do they also have crayons and medication?

Best comment I've read all day lol

1526069766_1AHEQxyRG9s6owyJHShB4U4rg9GL5.body: Well, I do know that the prices usually tank a little every Friday going into the weekend. That's the only thing I can think of. Haven't heard any big news today really

> [thunder33345](#comment_39_1AHEQxyRG9s6owyJHShB4U4rg9GL5FMX5K): some theories about mtgox https://www.ccn.com/8200-btc-moved-from-mt-gox-wallet-possible-sell-off-affects-bitcoin-price/dunno if it's trustworthy

Ahhh ok. Yeah I knew about this. He was moving coins around last week to a consolidation wallet. I was wondering when he was going to dump again. I wish the fucker would sell those BTC over the counter. He either doesn't realize the affect he's having or he just doesn't give a fuck.

The price dropped last time he sold a bunch off.

> [tomsawyer](#comment_3_1NkRbczBVD8gsCG5PMsS1b2gN63srsqYvp): Yeah, earning or mining straight crypto ftw. You need good offline trading possibilities, my friend ðŸ˜‰

Bisq is a nice decentralized exchange and you can use on-ramp/off-ramp solutions like the Cash app

1526455814_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6n.body: I was thinking also a ZeroNet addition to the code which would place a hovering button just below the '0' button that is clickable and when it is clicked it opens up a QR of the page's Bitcoin address so people could easily donate to the page. (This might be a point for another thread though).

1538256010_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGY.body: This is funny lol. Just a mention of it causes AV to go off. Wonder if that is the same thing that caused mine to go off for the 'Foretype.A!ml' Trojan?

> [piloth](#comment_27_1FKuNsExQML7APuNmkCV8uzB5pKupcmnck): This is funny lol. Just a mention of it causes AV to go off. Wonder if that is the same thing that caused mine to go off for the 'Foretype.A!ml' Trojan?

I was doing an update as recommended to fix my ZeroNet against the recently found security flaw and was moving my data folder over to the new ZN directory and during the file transfer between folders i got a hit on my Windows Defender about 'Foretype.A!ml' Trojan

Awesome! So when I change this in the Namecoin node under 'Configure name' it will update on the network after I insert the whole string mentioned?

Thanks everyone! Here it is... [Artifax Radio](http://127.0.0.1:43110/artifaxradio.bit/)
